body_html: Re static_assert(sizeof(TensorImpl) == sizeof(member1) + sizeof(member2) + ...) doesn't that miss the point? In particular, it won't tell if you if the size went up or down, if a member size changed.
body_text: Re static_assert(sizeof(TensorImpl) == sizeof(member1) + sizeof(member2) + ...) doesn't that miss the point? In particular, it won't tell if you if the size went up or down, if a member size changed.
body: Re `static_assert(sizeof(TensorImpl) == sizeof(member1) + sizeof(member2) + ...)` doesn't that miss the point? In particular, it won't tell if you if the size went up or down, if a member size changed.
